title: PRD ReDesign: RX Category Page

background.description: The RX Category Page serves as the main gateway for users exploring prescription treatments on DoktorABC. It must communicate trust, professionalism, and simplicity while leading users efficiently toward starting a consultation.

entry_points: Organic search (Google searches for specific treatments)
key_needs: Trust DoktorABC to handle prescription safely and discreetly

background.design_tone: Medical, reliable tone inspired by Hims and Ro, with visual consistency matching homepage and other category pages

characteristics: Arrive via search engines or campaigns
Looking for a trustworthy online consultation for a prescription treatment
Need to understand the steps clearly: consultation, approval, and delivery
Sensitive to legitimacy, price transparency, and doctor credibility
Have purchased before or used another treatment category
Want reassurance that they'll receive the same service quality and delivery times

success_indicators: +20% increase in conversion from RX category page → start consultation
+10% improvement in conversion from RX category page → paid order

competitor_inspiration.name: Hims
competitor_inspiration.notes: Clean, trustworthy layout with strong credibility signals

competitor_inspiration.name: Ro
competitor_inspiration.notes: Clear CTAs guiding users through fast, digital prescription flow

requirements: Displays general USPs identical to the homepage
Hero image: man and woman hugging, looking at each other
Title text introducing the RX category
3 visual stories guiding users through 3–4 simple steps
USPs displayed below: Delivered in 1–2 working days, Original and certified, Save time and money, Discreet service
Title: Search here by product name
Prominent search bar for quick product lookup
Reuse existing 3-step visual component from homepage
Visual display of subcategories/treatments similar to homepage category grid
Carousel of 3–5 short marketing videos with: Creator name, Age, Short quote/testimonial
5–7 FAQs about RX treatments and the consultation process
Supplementary text from ASO (educational or informational)
Banner promoting newsletter or special offers
User can input email or close banner
Links to related content or policies (from ASO)
Standard site footer with logo, navigation links, certifications, payment methods, address, disclaimer

development_requirements.description: Every RX Category Page must be built in the same consistent structure (order): 1) Global DoktorABC USPS component, 2) Navbar component, 3) CRM coupon component, 4) Hero section, 5) Trusted Shops widget, 6) RX-specific USPs section, 7) Category search section (showing products), 8) "How It Works" component, 9) "Top ratings & best guarantee" component, 10) FAQ section, 11) Customer Reviews component, 12) Payment methods strip, 13) "Medically and professionally tested" section, 14) "Your Privacy. Our Priority." banner, 15) Press section, 16) SEO content widget (for SEO team input), 17) More information section, 18) CRM subscription component, 19) Footer

The Hero section contains: Category image (pulled from BO, admin can upload/replace), Breadcrumb navigation path - identical behavior to production ("Home → Category"), Main title - pulled from BO, Subtitle (category description) - pulled from BO, Call to Action button: "Go to medical quest". The button color is controlled by the category's main and secondary colors, which are defined in the BO per category. Sticky behavior: On mobile, the CTA button must be sticky at the bottom of the screen. On desktop, the CTA appears inside the navbar.
Display the line: "Medical evaluation and prescription: €18.90 + cannabis-based medication from €3.00". The numbers (€18.90 and €3.00) are pulled dynamically from the DB, just like in production.
Integrate the Trusted Shops widget exactly as in production, same source and behavior.

Display the following fixed USPs for all RX category pages: 1) Prescription is issued online - No clinic visit needed, 2) Delivered in 1–2 working days - Fast, reliable delivery, 3) Original German medicine - From certified pharmacies, 4) Advice via online questionnaire - Quick medical guidance
Display a search component specific to the current RX category. The search results must show only products that belong to this category (as in current production).
Display the standard DoktorABC "How It Works" component - static, informative, and visually consistent with other pages.
Add the "Top Ratings & Best Guarantee" component (same design and logic as other pages).
The FAQ component must display questions and answers pulled from the BO, exactly as in current production. The first question is open by default. Localization per country (FR/DE) is required.
Display the standard Customer Reviews component used across DoktorABC pages. Pulls reviews dynamically from the DB.
Display a horizontal strip of all payment method logos (credit card, PayPal, Klarna, etc.), same as current production design.
Display the "Medically and professionally tested" section with content exactly as implemented in production, using data from the same DB source.
Display the "Your Privacy. Our Priority." banner (same design and logic as other pages).
